name: ecommerce-mern
description: Full-stack e-commerce website with MERN stack

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "set NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation && npm run client"
scripts.build: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
